snippet.title: Q: Estimating class probabilities with hierarchical random forest models
snippet.description: I am using a Random Forest classifier (in R) to predict the spatial distribution of multiple native plant communities using a variety of environmental variables as predictors. This classification … of two classes: Forest (F) and Grassland (G). Lets say for the second level each Forest and Grassland class is composed of 2 subclasses (F1,F2 and G1,G2).
